pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is hledger's curses-style interface. It is simpler and more convenient for browsing data than the command-line interface, but lighter and faster than hledger-web. hledger is a cross-platform program for tracking money, time, or any other commodity, using double-entry accounting and a simple, editable file format. It is inspired by and largely compatible with ledger(1). hledger provides command-line, curses and web interfaces, and aims to be a reliable, practical tool for daily use.

use.flag: Build with support for multithreaded execution.
